positions.name: Motive
positions.meaning: Why are you seeking the debugging oracle?

positions.name: Facet
positions.meaning: What part of the system is failing?

positions.name: Immediate Past
positions.meaning: What changed recently that caused the problem?

positions.name: The Action
positions.meaning: What must you do to address the problem?

positions.name: The Result
positions.meaning: What will happen if The Action is executed in its entirety?

positions.name: The Lesson
positions.meaning: What can be done to avoid similar problems going forward?
